resources.string: This game is about how fast your brain can process visual information given to it and take a decision. Now isn\'t that cool!
Find the best move for the token shown above the game board (To Play) using normal Tic Tac Toe rules (i.e. arrange three of a kind in a row, column or diagonal).

You are shown a random tic tac toe board with some squares marked with tokens. You task is to find the best move for the token mentioned above the board. For every correct move, your score increases by 1. You are given 60 seconds to score as high as possible. Additional time is awarded or a time penalty is applied based on your accuracy. The sound feedback tells you if your move was correct or not before the board changes to a new board. Read on to know more!
There are three difficulty modes viz. Child\'s play, I can do this and Are you kidding?

In this difficulty, the next move to play is always X. A bonus time of 5 seconds is awarded if you get 8 moves correct in a row. There is no time penalty for incorrect moves. A minimum score of 30 is required to unlock the next difficulty.

In this difficulty, the next move to play is always O. A bonus time of 4 seconds is awarded if you get 8 moves correct in a row. There is no time penalty for incorrect moves. A minimum score of 50 is required to unlock the next difficulty

In this difficulty, the next move to play can be X or O. A bonus time of 3 seconds is awarded if you get 8 moves correct in a row. There is a time penalty of 1 second for every incorrect move. A minimum score of 70 is required to complete the game. From here on, its just how much you can score. Go ahead! Give it a try!
The hardest Tic Tac Toe game ever!
